yaml.title: Dr. Jorge Abreu Vicente
yaml.subtitle:
üî≠ü™ê Astrophysicist

ü§ñüß¨ ML / AI researcher in biomedical sciences

üñãüó£ Science communicator

markdown.markdown:
I research how to use natural language processing (NLP) to build open science tools that revolutionize the way we do and understand science, by developing generative means of structuring data via large language models (LLMs) and knowledge graphs (KGs). I use these technologies to annotate and curate all molecular and cell biology knowledge into data structures that are understandable by both, human and machine. Publication records: - üéì [NASA/ADS Abstract System](https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/search/q=abreu-vicente&sort=date%20desc%2C%20bibcode%20desc&p_=0) - üå± [ORCID](https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0211-6416) - üéì[Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=Z6PbfP4AAAAJ&view_op=list_works&gmla=AJ1KiT3dZ5BrYMzQ35ZvYFL2cf6QeJUDXfNBwQvNLm4XD3bSwS-Wm6JisIQlEGY-m4MGlwRODBAL4oMWMTKzQiwuAF8FgnatlNfSLmlMXOA0oqbwL1TaEw1JW4lqh2RBFJBVHuf-yrSc_tRRW049ldS30Q) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ +--------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | ```{=html} | ```{=html} | | 2017 | Ph.D. cum laude in Natural Sciences | | ``` | ``` | | | ```{=html} | | |
